channel.title: Tutorial Npc
channel.description: Hello, I don't know how many of you have played IKOV RSPS, but I really love how you cannot click away from the dialogue of the tutorial npc. I decided I wanted to implement this into my RSPS, but I am really stumped on this one. I have looked all over Google for some kind of help/tutorial, but I have found nothing, and I wouldn't really know where to begin.. Can someone help me with a start?

item.title: Tutorial Npc
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Just stop the server from processing the packet.

Ex:
Walking.java

if(c.inTutorialDialogue()) return;
Boom. Now you can’t walk if the ‘inTutorialDialogue’ method returns true.

Read full topic

item.title: Tutorial Npc
item.dc:creator: @beale beale
item.description:
@beale wrote:

Hello, I don’t know how many of you have played IKOV RSPS, but I really love how you cannot click away from the dialogue of the tutorial npc. I decided I wanted to implement this into my RSPS, but I am really stumped on this one. I have looked all over Google for some kind of help/tutorial, but I have found nothing, and I wouldn’t really know where to begin… Can someone help me with a start?
